sentences.en: Of course, this setting only takes effect if the abscissa is displaying a Zero - line .
sentences.cn: 当然, 此配置仅在图表被配置为显示 零线 时生效.

sentences.en: Phosphorus content in accordance with the abscissa, the ordinate physiological parameters for growth curve for result analysis.
sentences.cn: 按照以磷含量为横坐标，各项生理参数为纵坐标绘制生长曲线，进行结果分析。

sentences.en: Position in the development of display images, but also can change the location to display the location, can customize the abscissa and ordinate values.
sentences.cn: 在制定的位置显示图像，还可以改变位置来显示位置，可以自定义横坐标和纵坐标的值。

sentences.en: The experimental curve runs nearly parallel to the abscissa.
sentences.cn: 实验曲线几乎与模座标平行.

sentences.en: Therefore, on the complex plane, robust stability can be formulated by minimization of pseudospectra abscissa.
sentences.cn: 于是在复平面上, 鲁棒稳定性问题就转化为伪谱横坐标(伪谱最右端的横坐标值)最小的优化问题.

sentences.en: This paper presents a method to calculate the short circuit current of an abscissa compensation circuit.
sentences.cn: 以电力系统中常见的串联补偿电路为研究对象,提出了一种新的分析方法——级数分析法.

sentences.en: This paper presents a method to short circuit current of an abscissa compensation circuit.
sentences.cn: 以电力系统中常见的串联补偿电路为研究对象,提出了一种新的分析方法——级数分析法.

sentences.en: Use a minimum of ordinate and abscissa values so they do not run together.
sentences.cn: 使用最低限度的协调与横坐标值使他们不跑在一起.

trans.tran_en: the horizontal or x-coordinate of a point in a two-dimensional system of Cartesian coordinates
